about_the_game:
"The Traveller Vanilla Version" is a choice driven high quality Visual Novel/Game with plenty of adventures.

The Traveller (it's his code name and yes, he is half British), a mysterious young man with many talents and a good sense of humor visits various places and completes certain tasks for a secret organization.

He is young, spirited and full of energy. The Traveller has a strong sense of justice and is always ready to help people out of trouble, especially beautiful girls.

In this game you need to accomplish your mission in a city and if you play it right, you can make friends with some hot local girls.

What's included:

- Three assignments to complete
- 10 girls you can meet (ranging from waitresses to FBI agents and celebrities)
- 20+ different locations
- 18 characters in total
- Multiple choices
- Good humor
- Bonus video for the winner
- Walkthrough (in case you're lost)

If you value high quality realistic 3D art and an interesting plot, this game is definitely for you!

N.B. Please note that this game is a non-adult version of "The Traveller" and doesn't have any adult scenes!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

name: The Traveller Vanilla Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Core i3 of Sandy Bridge generation or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Complete the mission for a secret organization and meet some hot girls and women!
